name: Biscoff Drizzled Cookie
description: A warm cookie layered with creamy Biscoff spread and finished with a silky Biscoff drizzle.

name: Kinder Bueno Cookie
description: A soft cookie filled with milk chocolate chunks and drizzled with creamy Kinder Bueno.

name: Creamy Blueberry Cookie
description: A soft cookie base finished with creamy cheesecake frosting and blueberry topping.

name: Dark Brownies Drizzled Cookie
description: A rich dark chocolate cookie topped with a smooth chocolate drizzle for the ultimate fudgy bite.

name: Salted Caramel Pecan Cookie
description: A chewy cookie packed with roasted pecans, topped with golden caramel and a hint of sea salt.

name: Strawberry Cheesecake Cookie
description: A buttery cookie topped with cheesecake cream and fresh strawberry drizzle.
